name: narcissus
description: Take screenshots using Headless-Chrome by Puppeteer
author: Meedan

scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm i && SLS_DEBUG='*' sls deploy --stage production --verbose --force --conceal
scripts.local: PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=false npm install && npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && SLOWMO_MS=250 node dist/local.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run cov:before && cp src/config.js.example src/config.js && npm run lint && npm run babel && npm run test && npm run cov:after
